author: Contributed P
text:
You might have enjoyed free Wi-Fi connectivity on the premises of swanky shopping malls, star hotels and even in corporate hospitals as the facility will be of great help to customers or patients visiting these places. A Tasmac bar at Palayamkottai has also found a place in this ‘prestigious list’ by offering free Wi-Fi connectivity.

Though the bar is situated in a narrow lane passing through the nauseating Palayam Irrigation Channel, the facility is being offered to those who consume liquor in this bar to attract young boozers.

(Contributed by P. Sudhakar)
title: Reporter's diary
